name: Timewinder Platformer: Full Movement!
description:
CONTROLS

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space Bar to jump
  • J to attack

NOTES

  • The player can take 3 hits before death
  • Bats can take 2 hits before death
  • Camera tracking is weird, I'm sorry :( I promise it's not like that in the editor

KNOWN BUGS (probably more)

  • Getting stuck on corners (might want to add rounded corners)
  • Jump Cut mechanism doesn't really work as well as I want it to :(
  • You can still move when you're dead :/
  • The combat system is janky

NOTE: art and animation are placeholders, they are from this project: https://github.com/zs8861/2D-Platform
